languages.text: "Ясно же стало мне все, пока я метался в бреду, оправляясь от ран, нанесенных мне в битве с братом Игнильфом. Тогда много темных видений явилось мне, и каждое испило каплю тепла из горячего сердца".

"Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."
languages.original_text: "Ясно же стало мне все, пока я метался в бреду, оправляясь от ран, нанесенных мне в битве с братом Игнильфом. Тогда много темных видений явилось мне, и каждое испило каплю тепла из горячего сердца".

traits.locale_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Todo me quedó claro cuando me debatía contra el delirio, recuperándome de las heridas que me había infligido la batalla conta mi hermano Ignilf. Muchas visiones oscuras se me aparecieron, extrayendo paulatinamente el calor de mi corazón ardiente».
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."

traits.locale_text: «Todo me quedó claro cuando me debatía contra el delirio, recuperándome de las heridas que me había infligido la batalla conta mi hermano Ignilf. Muchas visiones oscuras se me aparecieron, extrayendo paulatinamente el calor de mi corazón ardiente».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “和伊格尼夫兄弟那场战斗结束之后，当我受了伤，在神志不清的状态下挣扎的时候，一切都变得清晰起来。那时，我眼前出现了许多黑暗的幻象，每个幻象都在一点一滴地吸走我炽热内心中的温暖。”
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."

traits.locale_text: “和伊格尼夫兄弟那场战斗结束之后，当我受了伤，在神志不清的状态下挣扎的时候，一切都变得清晰起来。那时，我眼前出现了许多黑暗的幻象，每个幻象都在一点一滴地吸走我炽热内心中的温暖。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「イグニルフとの戦いで負った傷から回復し、錯乱の中でのたうち回っていたとき、全てがハッキリと見えたんだ。その時、たくさんの暗い幻影が俺の前に現れ、そのひとつひとつが俺の燃える心から温もりを一滴ずつしぼり取った」
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."

traits.locale_text: 「イグニルフとの戦いで負った傷から回復し、錯乱の中でのたうち回っていたとき、全てがハッキリと見えたんだ。その時、たくさんの暗い幻影が俺の前に現れ、そのひとつひとつが俺の燃える心から温もりを一滴ずつしぼり取った」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai fini par ouvrir les yeux quand je me débattais dans les affres de l'inconscience, lors de la convalescence qui a suivi mon combat contre mon frère Ignilf. Maintes sombres visions me sont alors apparues, et chacune a drainé goutte après goutte la chaleur qui animait mon cœur brûlant. »
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai fini par ouvrir les yeux quand je me débattais dans les affres de l'inconscience, lors de la convalescence qui a suivi mon combat contre mon frère Ignilf. Maintes sombres visions me sont alors apparues, et chacune a drainé goutte après goutte la chaleur qui animait mon cœur brûlant. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Alles wurde mir klar, als ich im Delirium wild um mich schlug, mich von den Wunden erholte, die ich im Kampf gegen meinen Bruder Ignilf erlitten hatte. Viele dunkle Visionen erschienen mir, und jede einzelne ließ die Wärme aus meinem brennenden Herzen bluten, Tropfen für Tropfen."
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."

traits.locale_text: "Alles wurde mir klar, als ich im Delirium wild um mich schlug, mich von den Wunden erholte, die ich im Kampf gegen meinen Bruder Ignilf erlitten hatte. Viele dunkle Visionen erschienen mir, und jede einzelne ließ die Wärme aus meinem brennenden Herzen bluten, Tropfen für Tropfen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."

languages.text: "Kardeşim İgnilf'in savaşta bana verdiği yaraların iyileşmesini bekleyip hezeyan içinde etrafta koşuştururken her şeyi anladım. O zamanlar birçok karanlık görü, zihnimi ele geçirmişti. Her biri, yanan kalbimin ateşini teker teker çaldı."
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I was thrashing around in a delirium, recovering from the wounds dealt to me in the battle with my brother Ignilf. Many dark visions appeared before me then, and each one bled the warmth from my burning heart, one drop at a time."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşim Ignilf'in savaşta bana verdiği yaraların iyileşmesini beklerken ve hezeyan içinde etrafta koşuştururken her şeyi anladım. O zamanlar birçok karanlık görü zihnimi ele geçirmişti. Her biri yanan kalbimin ateşini teker teker çaldı."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
